name: Ditech ruleset
description: These rules must be respected by all the AL code written within the company.

rules.justification: Follow the style guide about the best practices for naming.
The name of temporary variable must be prefixed with Temp.
Do not declare variables that are unused.
Do not assign a text to a target with smaller size.
Do not use identical names for local and global variables.
To avoid confusion, do not give local variables the same name as fields, methods or actions in the same scope.
To avoid confusion, do not give methods the same name as fields or actions in the same scope.
To avoid confusion, do not give global variables the same name as fields, methods or actions in the same scope.
The count of option captions specified in the OptionCaption property is wrong.
The local method must be used; otherwise removed.
The name of non-temporary variables must not be prefixed with Temp.
Placeholders should have a comment explaining their content.(Collision with AL Language Tool Extension)
Manifest property is required for AppSource submission.
The 'applicationInsightsKey' property must specify the AAD instrumentation key.
The property 'url' must be set to a valid URL. (URL for app mobile)
The compilation target is set to 'OnPrem', but it must be set to 'Cloud' or 'Extension'
Use of implicit 'with' will be removed in the future'
